title: SSS Sex,Secret Aur Saaya
overview: "Sex, Secret aur Saaya" is a suspenseful thriller series that delves into the sinister secrets lurking within the mysterious room no. 911 of the Vaani Resort. As a couple's honeymoon takes a horrifying turn, Sub-Inspector Balli, along with the help of Priya- the newly appointed employee at Vani Resort, and Sanjay- a guest whose wife goes missing after checking into room 911, unravels a web of deceit and crimes orchestrated by the resort's owner, Raj, and his accomplices. Amidst betrayals and revelations, the truth behind Room 911's dark history comes to light, leading to shocking confessions and a desperate fight for justice and survival.
